'''''Back for More''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use the power of the Phagocytic Energy Blocks to immobilize the following enemies: [[Consecrated Red Vulture]], [[Consecrated Scorpion]], [[Consecrated Flying Serpent]], [[Consecrated Horned Crocodile]], and [[Consecrated Fanged Beast]].
